modName: Mod to Allow Emptying of Murky Water Jars
modShortDescription: Another tiny mod. Right-click with murky water jar onto water or any terrain block to "empty" the jars.
modDescription:
Another tiny mod. Boidster was playing around and it worked; maybe it’ll be useful to someone.

Right-click with murky water jar onto water or any terrain block to “empty” the jars. Will not add water into the terrain or re-fill “holes” in water. Just empties the jars.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1OJaD2IZL_dRTPr-2vTFjble0VL3B5lVR)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21508-modlet-to-allow-emptying-of-murky-water-jars/).

**Credits:** [Boidster](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/boidster/)
